context: Mentorship/guidance. Greenberg brought Epstein on as money manager at Bear Stearns in 1976
In late 1960s Wexner found mentor in Taubman

Career mentorship. Met at Bear Stearns 1976-1981. Epstein became Wexner's money manager. In 1991 Wexner made Epstein trustee of Ohio Higher Education Trust ($230M) and Wexner Foundation. Allegedly fired Epstein in 2005 after Palm Beach investigation started, replaced with Dennis Hersch.
